hero.title: Organic Farming & Ethical Animal Care
hero.subtitle: We promote free-range practices and natural feeding for healthier animals and better products

about.title: About KKP
about.description: KKP is an integrated agro farm located in Keronkhal, Chandina, Cumilla, promoting organic feeding and ethical treatment of animals through free-ranging practices. We specialize in dairy, poultry, and kennel operations.

values.title: Our Values
items: Local Feed: We use locally sourced, natural feed for our animals
Free Range: Our animals are allowed to roam freely in natural environments
Ethical Practices: We maintain the highest standards of animal welfare
Quality Products: We produce premium quality, healthy products

milk.title: Fresh Milk
milk.description: Pure, fresh cow milk from free-range cattle, collected daily.

eggs.title: Free-Range Eggs
eggs.description: Organic eggs from free-range chickens fed with natural grains.

ghee.title: Pure Ghee
ghee.description: Traditional homemade ghee prepared from our farm's fresh milk.

curd.title: Natural Yogurt
curd.description: Creamy, probiotic-rich yogurt made from pure cow's milk.

cattle.title: Cattle Farming
cattle.description: Our cows are raised in a free-range environment, ensuring they receive proper nutrition and care for the best quality milk and meat products.

poultry.title: Poultry
poultry.description: Our free-range poultry provides nutritious eggs and quality meat, with birds living in natural conditions and fed organic feed.

kennel.title: Dog Kennel
kennel.description: We breed and raise healthy puppies with proper care, nutrition, and socialization to ensure they become wonderful companions.

others.title: Other Operations
others.description: We also maintain fisheries and grow agricultural crops using sustainable practices that respect the environment.
